_comment: Expected file generation and CI gate thresholds for evua-benchmark-01.

_notes.min_auto_coverage: At least 60% of nodes must be auto-migrated (2 of 3 = 66.7%)
_notes.expected_manual_ratio: At most 40% of changes can be MANUAL (1 of 3 = 33.3%)
_notes.expected_validation: false because ng test is not installed in eval environment â€” snapshot comparison is the real signal
_notes.generated_files: Paths are relative to engine root where cli.py runs
